data.text: @DonCarlosToledo @GlockfordFiles The fact that you don’t understand shows a lot about you. https://t.co/HPCJVkr4jw

@GlockfordFiles I'm a forgiving dude.

(As long as they stop with the mask and vaccine mandates, I am willing to {try to} forget that it ever happened).
@GlockfordFiles Not far enough.  Remember the companies that mandated vaccines.  Tyson Foods; I am looking at you.
@K8W1728917 @GlockfordFiles @JesusJS92837369 The pro-maskers, pro-vaxxers, deniers of individual rights already did that to those who tried to educate them.
@GlockfordFiles @FoundngAttitude I won't be forgetting anytime soon, f these people.
@GlockfordFiles @JesusJS92837369 We can’t look down on people who believe different from us. We need too keep educating them.
@GlockfordFiles @JimSpiker And while you're at it, listen to Dan Bongino's latest podcast. Pfizer has admitted horrors. Good luck, people.
